subsection.name: Class Name
subsection.p: The Breadcrumb plugin is implemented by the class:

subsection.name: Purpose
subsection.p: This class is used to create a Breadcrumb provider and set the breadcrumbs. The provider can be instantiated within a component to add breadcrumb functionalities by composition. It can be easily extended for specific, custom needs.

tr.td: A separator for the links that are displayed.

The first part of the breadcrumb is generated from the expanded sitemenu items of the menu named 'main' or from multiple menu's as configured by this parameter. The last ("trailing") part of the breadcrumb is generated from the resolved sitemap item belonging to the current request. The trailing items are based on the current resolved sitemap item and then moving upwards, until the highest menu item is encountered.

subsection.name: Example of a template for the Breadcrumb
subsection.p: This is an example Freemarker template for the breadcrumb.
Create the following Freemarker Page in bootstrap/webfiles/src/main/resources/site/freemarker/myhippoproject/breadcrumb.ftl
subsection.source: <#include "../include/imports.ftl"> <#-- @ftlvariable name="breadcrumb" type="org.onehippo.forge.breadcrumb.om.Breadcrumb" --> <#if breadcrumb?? && breadcrumb.items??> <#list breadcrumb.items as item> <@hst.link var="link" link=item.link/> ${item.title?html}<#sep> ${breadcrumb.separator}

li.p: In the console, add breadcrumb.template to the /hst:hst/hst:configurations/myhippoproject/hst:templates with a property as defined in the XML below. Alternatively, append the following XML to the bootstrap/configuration/src/main/resources/hst/configurations/myhippoproject/templates

In the console, add breadcrumb to the /hst:hst/hst:configurations/myhippoproject/hst:components with a property as defined in the XML below. Alternatively, create breadcrumb.xml in the bootstrap/configuration/src/main/resources/hst/configurations/myhippoproject/components with the following:
li.source: <sv:node sv:name="breadcrumb"> <sv:property sv:name="jcr:primaryType" sv:type="Name"> <sv:value>hst:component</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hst:componentclassname" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>org.onehippo.forge.breadcrumb.components.BreadcrumbComponent</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hst:template" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>breadcrumb.template</sv:value> </sv:property> </sv:node>
li.p: Append the bootstrap/configuration/src/main/resources/hippoecm-extension.xml with the new component: breadcrumb
li.source: <sv:node sv:name="myhippoproject-configuration-components-breadcrumb"> <sv:property sv:name="jcr:primaryType" sv:type="Name"> <sv:value>hippo:initializeitem</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:sequence" sv:type="Double"> <sv:value>30086</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentresource" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>hst/configurations/myhippoproject/components/breadcrumb.xml</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentroot" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>/hst:hst/hst:configurations/myhippoproject/hst:components</sv:value> </sv:property> </sv:node>

li.p: To apply the breadcrumb to a specific page in the website: in the console, add the breadcrumb to the specific page in /hst:hst/hst:configurations/myhippoproject/hst:pages/ For example, applying breadcrumb to the news page will require adding breadcrumb to the /hst:hst/hst:configurations/myhippoproject/hst:pages/newspage/main.The XML should look like this:
In the news page Freemarker template, add the following reference: <@hst.include ref="breadcrumb"/>

To apply breadcrumb to *all* pages in the website: in the console, add breadcrumb to /hst:hst/hst:configurations/myhippoproject/hst:abstractpages/base/main/. Include the HST reference <@hst.include ref="breadcrumb"/> to the base page Freemarker template.
